name: ShowAsIs
description: Google Slide has CJK font issue; What You See Is NOT What You Get in presentation mode.

browser_action.default_title:
Shows the fonts as is for CJK in Google Slide presentation mode.
* Turn off spelling suggestion under View of Google Slide.
* Turn off fullscreen toolbar under View of Chrome.
* Click 'Show As Is' button in Slide or extension icon, voila~
